name: MusicSubscriptionOffer.Options
desc: Options for loading subscription offers for Apple Music.

items.name: init(action: MusicSubscriptionOffer.Action, messageIdentifier: MusicSubscriptionOffer.MessageIdentifier, itemID: MusicItemID?, affiliateToken: String?, campaignToken: String?)
items.desc: Creates options for a subscription offer sheet with specific values for common properties.

items.name: var action: MusicSubscriptionOffer.Action
items.desc: An action for the subscription offers entry point.

items.name: var affiliateToken: String?
items.desc: An affiliate token for the Apple Services affiliate program.

items.name: var campaignToken: String?
items.desc: A campaign token for the Apple Services affiliate program.

items.name: var itemID: MusicItemID?
items.desc: An identifier for the music item the user is trying to access, which requires an active subscription.

items.name: var messageIdentifier: MusicSubscriptionOffer.MessageIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier for selecting the main message that the subscription offer sheet presents to the user.

items.name: static let `default`: MusicSubscriptionOffer.Options
items.desc: The default set of options for loading subscription offers for Apple Music.
